element.name: All My Friends by Donnacha, Traditional Cache (1/1.5)

tr.td:
Located along the Cliff Walk between Bray And Greystones. The 5K walk is one of the most spectacular coastal walks in Ireland and is popular with many walkers. You can approach this cache from either the Bray or Greystones side. If starting from Greystones parking is available @ N53 09.003 W6 03.950. From here the cache is about a 40 minute walk. If starting from Bray, parking is available @ N53 11.712 W6 05.335. From here the cache is about a 60 minute walk. Located along the same route is Europe's First Cache which is about 3K north of the cache site, towards Bray.
Care will be needed if children are along for the cache. The path is a safe distance from the cliff edge, but there is little or no fencing along the edge.
IT IS IMPORTANT THAT THE CACHE IS RE-HIDDEN PROPERLY

center.font: Visit the Geocaching Ireland discussion forum HERE

element.additional-waypoints:
P1PVB6 - Parking - Greystones
N 53° 09.003 W 006° 03.950
P2PVB6 - Parking - Bray
N 53° 11.712 W 006° 05.335
element.encoded-hints: ivy covered tree, little less than head height

ul.li:
2010-05-23T19:00:00Z : Found it by Ravenheart
Found with Galric and PhantomGuy. TNLN TFTC

2010-05-21T19:00:00Z : Found it by Elvistones
Nice walk :) TFTC

2010-05-21T19:00:00Z : Found it by Ice Verus
thank you

2010-05-21T19:00:00Z : Found it by Fosy
thank you

2010-05-03T19:00:00Z : Found it by blue_eyes_ie
Loved the walk it was such a beautiful day, TFTC.

2009-03-14T19:00:00Z : Found it by Kersti.com
On a walk from Bray to Greystones with Christian and Anton we stopped to look at this tree. I pulled out the GPS to see how much further we had to go on our trip and ooh look - a cache right here! In hand very quickly. TFTC

Located along the Cliff Walk between Bray And Greystones. The 5K walk is one of the most spectacular coastal walks in Ireland and is popular with many walkers. You can approach this cache from either the Bray or Greystones side. If starting from Greystones parking is available @ N53 09.003 W6 03.950. From here the cache is about a 40 minute walk. If starting from Bray, parking is available @ N53 11.712 W6 05.335. From here the cache is about a 60 minute walk. Located along the same route is Europe's First Cache which is about 3K north of the cache site, towards Bray.

Care will be needed if children are along for the cache. The path is a safe distance from the cliff edge, but there is little or no fencing along the edge.
